name: Glutton's Heaven
description:
In this game, you must help out a fat man going through hell. Balance your food choices wisely; eating greasy goodness will give you more health but make you slower, and nasty greens will take away health but make you run faster.

Controls:

A, D - Run left and right

Spacebar - Jump

Hold Shift - Releases food in gaseous form

This game was made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 40.

All assets were created during the 72 hour time period.
